sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Default">2f7e6c88839b1210cccd5d10feaad3e7</macroponent><name>setTotalUsers</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    // Retrieve data from the aggregation resource
    const resourcePath = '@data.aggregation_query_1.output.data.GlideAggregate_Query.0.count';
    // Use the API to fetch the data
    const count = api.getValue(resourcePath);

    // Set the client state parameter
    api.setState('totalRecords', count || 0); // Default to 0 if the count is not available
}
]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-01-21 10:08:27</sys_created_on><sys_id>1b48d1a48357d210cccd5d10feaad3f9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>setTotalUsers</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Automotive Service Management" source="x_1522458_automo_0">22ad9dee83861210cccd5d10feaad392</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Automotive Service Management">22ad9dee83861210cccd5d10feaad392</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_1b48d1a48357d210cccd5d10feaad3f9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-01-21 10:08:27</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
